About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Learn something new everyday

I am changing careers to become a Software/Web Developer because I want to use my creativity to produce tools that make people lives easier/better. The decision to transition into software engineering was easy because I wanted leverage my math background and this field has promising career path with ample opportunities. Moreover, this career path excites me because I consider myself to be a lifelong learner and software engineering is a field that is always evolving.


My natural ability to collaborate, empathize and relate to people is what makes me unique. These transitional skills helped me to be successful in a structured environment because I was able to build relationships with both my colleagues as well as my students. Additionally, I am fluent in English and Spanish.
